title: Thirty Two
summary: Thirty two pixels is all you need. The best retro style watch face. LED,LCD joy!
description: Thirty Two brings true retro flavor to your Android Wear watch. Show off your smart watch in fantastic 32x32 pixel glory. This watch face simulates various classic LED and LCD dot matrix displays.IMPORTANT: If you see a permission dialog asking for 'Identity' permissions it's not because the watch face actually does anything with it. I'm still investigating and trying to get rid of this. Rest assured however, the watchface isn't doing anything with any of your personal information.Features:- Many different color themes- Configurable anti aliasing- Configurable ticks- Configurable width of clock hands- Superb burn-in protection- Compatible with all Android Wear watches
descriptionHTML:
Thirty Two brings true retro flavor to your Android Wear watch. Show off your smart watch in fantastic 32x32 pixel glory. This watch face simulates various classic LED and LCD dot matrix displays.

IMPORTANT: If you see a permission dialog asking for 'Identity' permissions it's not because the watch face actually does anything with it. I'm still investigating and trying to get rid of this. Rest assured however, the watchface isn't doing anything with any of your personal information.
Features:

- Many different color themes
- Configurable anti aliasing
- Configurable ticks
- Configurable width of clock hands
- Superb burn-in protection
- Compatible with all Android Wear watches
comments: Loved this watch face on my old Moto 360 but it doesn't show up in the app store on my new Zen Watch 3, none of the watch faces from this Marco van Hylckama does. Not compatible?
Love the face! As others have said a color customization option would be appreciated, but for a free watch face this is superb.
I have a problem on huawei watch 2, the watch is not in the middle, some part of it is out of the screen
Favorite watch face I keep going back to, but I want to know where did the customization options go? I can't find an app to open any more to change it.
My favorite This is my favorite watch face for my moto360. Nice work
recentChanges: The watch face should now work on newer watches with different resolutions.
